biotools.summary: ShinyArchR.UiO (ShinyArchR User interface Open) is an user-friendly, integrative, and open-source shiny-based web app using R programming for visualization of massive single-cell chromatin accessibility data (scATAC-seq) based on ArchR, (Granja et al, 2021).

bioschemas.name: ShinyArchR UiO
bioschemas.summary: ShinyArchR.UiO (ShinyArchR User interface Open) is an user-friendly, integrative, and open-source shiny-based web app using R programming for visualization of massive single-cell chromatin accessibility data (scATAC-seq) based on ArchR, (Granja et al, 2021).
